message.body: Alpha version of 0pen World, free and fair news reporting platform: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1moiuS1r6cE8Ax4rvxEamkBK8opx7FUpH/ Thoughts and feedback to contribute towards a democratic platform is aprreciated!

(if anyone else wants to send a mail, feel free!)
hey! @erkan@zid I don't mean to be rude, but can you check your inbox, you have mail. ;) Have a nice day everyone!!!!
@erkan@zid Ok, thanks for the info, shall look for another way. Have a nice day!

2 questions... is it possible to put a favicon in a zeronet site? And is it possible to add a vanitygen adress to a site that already exists, and if so how? If any one could answer these questions it would be much appreciated. :)  Have a nice day!!!!
